https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zH4ZwUDMCnKVL7hc2fLdLVKegGe.jpg In a small town in Greece, when amorous passion meets with greed money, dead bodies start pilling up and "Sleeping Beauty" Olga will never know the horrors she has been spared of. Ballad for a Pierced Heart
